ygData.subject: Re: Unique Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, I would like to see a site database that I can query to it. I want to be able to see what a Paladin can carry.  Don t really care what an Monk can
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, I would like to see a site database that I can query to it. I
want to be able to see what a Paladin can carry. Don't really care what an
Monk can carry. Just basically filter the data a bit more. (OK, wish list)
I would like to be able to sort the data by ac, weight, damage, range, ...
maybe special ability (not sure how this would be done, alphabetical?). I
would like to see even the basic items listed LIKE BANDED. I don't know how
many sites I have gone to and not seen banded listed, which tells me the
site is a joke, because they only list "special" items and/or items in the
book, which I already have.

I do like having the spoiler listed on a different page, or farther down the
page (if done you should have a big graphic "SPOILER" so people who don't
want it). Just note I run with a 1600x1200 resolution so put it far down
the page (I know lucky me, but you stare at a computer screen for 8 to 10
hours a day and then go home an play EQ for another 3 to 5 hours)

OH, one other thing since it is listed, Race, like to be able to say I was a
large paladin, again don't care for the stuff I can't use because of my
race.

And yes I would do this but don't have a database available to me that
people could query to, and don't have a server I can put the data on. I
would be willing to help (stress help) with the database and development of
the web pages, but I don't have those tools available to me.

David

----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 5:02 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unique Items


From: Michael Ott <mott@...>

its a good idea if it is carried through... so far i have yet to see a site
that really does that. No one takes the time to actually build a database of
stuff most rely on volunteer submissions wh8ich sucks because you dont get a
good response that way. Whoever runs a site needs to go out and do most of
the research and keep it up with all of the current patches once again I
have not yet seen this...
